agents.theme: Professional asbestos removal with comprehensive safety equipment and protective gear in industrial setting

quadrants.top_left: Workers in full protective suits and respirators handling hazardous asbestos materials with specialized tools and equipment
quadrants.top_right: Safety warning signs, containment barriers, and professional hazmat equipment setup in industrial facility
quadrants.bottom_left: Asbestos removal process documentation, testing equipment, and quality control procedures
quadrants.bottom_right: Clean and decontaminated work environment after professional asbestos remediation completion

agents.theme: Construction safety coordination and site management with professional safety planning and equipment

quadrants.top_left: Safety coordinator in hard hat and high-visibility vest reviewing construction site safety plans and procedures
quadrants.top_right: Construction workers following strict safety protocols with proper PPE on active building site
quadrants.bottom_left: Safety equipment storage, first aid stations, and emergency response coordination setup
quadrants.bottom_right: Site safety meeting with construction team discussing safety procedures and risk management

agents.theme: Environmental contamination assessment and comprehensive soil investigation with modern testing equipment

quadrants.top_left: Environmental scientists in protective gear collecting soil and groundwater samples from contaminated site
quadrants.top_right: Advanced laboratory analysis of contaminated materials using sophisticated testing and measurement equipment
quadrants.bottom_left: Professional site investigation equipment including drilling rigs, sampling tools, and monitoring devices
quadrants.bottom_right: Comprehensive environmental assessment documentation, reporting, and regulatory compliance procedures

agents.theme: Sustainable building demolition and material recycling with environmental focus and waste reduction

quadrants.top_left: Selective demolition work with careful material separation and sorting for maximum recycling potential
quadrants.top_right: Heavy machinery and specialized equipment for controlled building deconstruction and material recovery
quadrants.bottom_left: Systematic material sorting and processing for recycling, reuse, and sustainable waste management
quadrants.bottom_right: Clean construction site with materials ready for transport to recycling facilities and reprocessing

agents.theme: Professional construction mediation and conflict resolution with collaborative problem-solving approach

quadrants.top_left: Professional mediator facilitating discussion between construction project stakeholders in conference setting
quadrants.top_right: Construction project team engaged in collaborative problem-solving session with architectural plans and documents
quadrants.bottom_left: Mediation meeting room setup with professional documentation and conflict resolution materials
quadrants.bottom_right: Successful mediation conclusion with handshakes and signed agreements between project parties

agents.theme: Industrial facility decommissioning and hazardous material management with specialized safety protocols

quadrants.top_left: Industrial decommissioning team in full protective equipment removing hazardous materials from manufacturing facility
quadrants.top_right: Specialized containment systems and safety barriers for hazardous material isolation and removal
quadrants.bottom_left: Professional documentation and testing procedures for industrial contamination assessment and remediation
quadrants.bottom_right: Clean industrial space after successful decommissioning and hazardous material removal completion

agents.theme: Environmental monitoring and compliance with comprehensive testing and documentation procedures

quadrants.top_left: Environmental monitoring specialists using advanced equipment to measure air quality and contamination levels
quadrants.top_right: Comprehensive environmental testing laboratory with sophisticated analytical instruments and quality control
quadrants.bottom_left: Professional environmental compliance documentation, reporting systems, and regulatory submission procedures
quadrants.bottom_right: Environmental monitoring data analysis and interpretation with computer modeling and trend analysis

agents.theme: Professional project management and coordination with comprehensive planning and execution oversight

quadrants.top_left: Project managers coordinating complex remediation project with detailed planning documents and timeline management
quadrants.top_right: Professional project coordination meeting with stakeholders reviewing progress and addressing challenges
quadrants.bottom_left: Comprehensive project management software and documentation systems for tracking progress and compliance
quadrants.bottom_right: Successful project completion celebration with team members and satisfied clients reviewing final deliverables
